full_text: Just putting it out there now in advance, I’ll be a fan of whatever team Juan Soto is on. https://t.co/nidb33WWSm

The Play-In tournament gotta go… Like what exactly is the purpose? You got two teams both more than 10 games under .500 playing in this for what? To potentially get the 8th seed to get waxed by the Suns in 4 games?
ready for the draft to be here. Mock draft szn is getting boring
